name: Simple Click Solutions
tag_list: web-design, website-design, web-development, usability, usability-testing, ipswich, user-testing, social-media
overview:
Simple Click Solutions Limited, also known as SimpleClick, is a no fuss website development company. There ethos is to keep things simple for the customer. This doesnâ€™t mean there expertise or products are sub standard; quite the contrary - they make complicated websites simple to understand and manage.

SimpleClick, which is based in Ipswich, Suffolk, is headed by three Directors; Richard Jennis, Stephen Tang and Claire Thorpe. All of them have been working with the internet for over 10 years. The wider team comprises of project managers, designers, programmers and online marketeers - all recruited for their ability to deliver.
